type.name: Agile
type.des: Influence defensive success rate, attack speed, and provide base attack power for archers

type.name: Power
type.des: Influence the attack success rate, strengthen damage, and provide base attack power for the swordsman

type.name: Intel
type.des: Influence magic limit, skill attack power, and provide base attack power for magician

type.name: Life
type.des: When the life is 0, the character will die

type.name: Maximum Life
type.des: If you lose all your health you die

type.name: Shame back blood
type.des: Restore maximum percentage of health when killing a monster

type.name: Shameback Blue
type.des: Restore maximum mana percentage when killing monsters

type.name: Maximum guard value
type.des: Priority deduction of partial protective value when receiving damage

type.name: Guard response
type.des: Automatic reply to guard value every 5 seconds

type.name: AG value
type.des: some special skill consumption AG value

type.name: maximum AG value
type.des: some special skill consumption AG value

type.name: AG value reply
type.des: Automatic reply to 5 AG values ​​every 5 seconds

type.name: Attack
type.des: The higher the damage, the higher the damage caused

type.name: Min attack
type.des: the minimum limit of random attack power when attacking

type.name: Max attack
type.des: Maximum random attack power at attack

type.name: Defense
type.des: The higher the defense, the lower the damage received

type.name: Attack Rate
type.des: The higher the attack success rate, the higher the chance of an attack hitting an enemy

type.name: Defense Rate
type.des: The higher the defense success rate, the higher the chance of evading the enemy's attack

type.name: The chance to flash
type.des: You must avoid the risk of enemy attacks

type.name: Add kill experience
type.des: Raise experience gained from killing monster

type.name: Sin value
type.des: active kill white name player, will increase sin value

type.name: Assault speed
type.des: The higher the attack speed, the shorter the skill CD

type.name: Ignore defenses
type.des: When attacking, there is a chance to ignore all enemy defenses

type.name: Mole Reflex
type.des: Injury to the attacker when receiving damage

type.name: Damage reduction
type.des: Reduce the percentage chance of receiving damage yourself!

type.name: Forced damage
type.des: Fixed damage to the opponent when attacking a place

type.name: Protection Relief
type.des: The proportion of deducted guard value when receiving damage

type.name: Ignore Defense
type.des: When attacking, we must ignore enemy's defense force

type.name: Attempt response attack probability AG value
type.des: Attack probability recovery response AG value

type.name: Return blood volume from damage probability
type.des: Recover blood volume from damage probability

type.name: Percentage of wound healing blood percentage
Percentage of injury recovery protection value
type.des: Percentage of injury recovery prevention value

type.name: Excellent hit rate
type.des: In case of attack, extra chance of massive damage (number of green damage)

type.name: Extraordinary Damage
type.des: Injury bonus from a superb strike

type.name: Excellent Resistance
type.des: Reduce the chance of being defeated by the enemy

type.name: Lucky hit rate
type.des: The chance of directly causing maximum attack (blue damage number) when attacking

type.name: Fortune Resist
type.des: Reduce the chance of a lucky attack by the enemy

type.name: Fateful Strike Rate
type.des: The chance of double damage when attacking

type.name: Fatal Resistance
type.des: Reduce the chance of a fatal blow by the enemy

type.name: Skill Accident
type.des: The percentage of skill damage increased when a skill is released

type.name: Percentage reduction in skill consumption blue
Percentage reduction in consumption of AGs by large strokes
type.des: Percentage reduction in consumption of AGs by large strokes

type.name: Money increase
type.des: Increase the number of gold coins dropped when killing a monster
